wordpressPost.title: The first acts for the Øya 2016 line-up
wordpressPost.content:
AURORA
BIOSPHERE
LUSH (UK)
NEUROSIS (US)
FRØKEDAL & FAMILIEN
BEACH SLANG (US)
ELECTRIC EYE
OKAY KAYA

 

The ticket sales have started for Øya 2016, and here are the first eight acts to be part of Norway’s greatest and most diverse festival line-up. We can promise more names already next week, and even more bands before Christmas.

 

ABOUT TICKETS

Tickets for Øya 2016 are now on sale at Billettservice. Week passes includes four days in Tøyenparken, and our opening day Klubbdagen (shows in more than 20 clubs in the city centre). Day passes are also on sale.

 

Artist profiles will be updated soon
